WRITING.TITLE: After relentlessly checking every pokemon, I finally have my Halloween shiny. Was lowkey hopping for Shuppet, but no complaints here.

WRITING.TEXT: Screenshot
Photo
Thanks! Yup cannot complain my friend has gotten sweet all, and I got the puppy and a perfect stats Halloween pichu. Im sure her luck will change next event.
My very first encounter of the morning was shiny pinsar. I was so groggy and confused. XD

Huh. I had a three hour extension...started at 2 and went to 8? I was out for all of it besides the last 40 minutes because I was exhausted. The first 1 and a half hours were horrible with connection issues (still somehow managed to get a shiny in that time) and I did notice the spawn rate was nothing like either of the beldum days I participated in. I got 6 shiny cyndaquil plus one regular 96% statted one. Averages to be one per hour, which yes, is nothing like the shiny spawn rate of Beldum day but I feel like noone should be complaining if they got atleast one. I was a spitting grumpy mess during the first hour and a half (because seriously wtf Niantic) but after the first shiny Community Day paid off for me, and the rest was icing. Comparatively my friend played about three hours and got a fat lot of shit all. RNG does as RNG will do. I'll trade her one of mine when I see her next weekend so she can't complain either.
Oh dude. Sorry at ran after the razz and ultra. :(
Edit just checked my logs and I played to 6:15 not 7:15 like I thought so yeah, only 2 hours extension. Its what I get for posting at 3am.
I didnt.

Also Australian (ive never had the cops called on me for pokemon, though) If they were in a marked car and crawling behind you..you can always walk straight towards them and directly ask what the problem is. Can even ask for their badge number. Police are supposed to make us feel safe and not creep us out.
I have 200 feebas candy - was waiting for a shiny feebas to bother to evelve one. I got 1/4. No idea how people managed so many tasks. Congrats on yours though!
I'm stuck where you are 1/5 eggseed bros. I have an aerodactyl saved up. Luckily I have Lets Go so it isn't a big deal. Its my only quest line left to complete though.
How did you cram in 140 tasks? That sounds amazingly stressful!

Weather is not a thing you can complain about. Where it is freezing in some places of the world it is boiling in other places and perfectly fine in the rest. There is no day an event can be held where it is 100% perfect weather globally. It was hot today in where I live and the burning hot dry sun made walking a lot of extra effort. I only manged a couple of tasks myself. I think they are not clear enough with the tasks shinies and their odds (i think it was the same odds as the shiny caterpie tasks?) I also think the tasks were way to long to be completed in a three hour time window. Like wtf, hatch an egg? Its frustrating to try and fail. I think they were aiming for a fun event to mimic the original difficult way you had to get feebas in which ever game it was. They failed on the fun part. But complaining it is too hard because of weather were *you* are is a reach.
Get decent stats on either?
Ah, a snowy form! I'll have to leave my country to see one. Doesn't snow here. But I like your extra rare spoopy one.
Depends on which part of Australia. But I still agree with you.
Did ya luck out on the stats though?
Don't down vote him because you jelly. It is just sad.
You gonna give her one? O.o The way you are talking its like you will hold out on her.

I agree. The problem is communication. If they had said upfront the shiny rate was 1/50 people would have not gone in expecting to get a shiny. Some people would still be sour grapes but some people always are. As it is it seems like 90% of the playerbase is ranging from extremely dissapointed to ready to quit. Im sure this isnt the outcome they had hoped for.

Be a charming young man. :) Or don't and keep the hate strong for old people. Doesnt affect me.

Gaming will always be there. Try other activities like physical sports or something creative like learn an instrument or write or paint. I am 32, have gamed since my age was in single digits. Sometimes I have stretches where I just don't feel like gaming, and I prefer to devour movies or books or write. And then when Im not feeling writing or reading I feel like gaming again. You might not be on top of all the main stream releases, but theyll be waiting for you when or if you get back. *shrug*

WRITING.TITLE: My elderly and very dead founder's spouse gave birth to a baby. I need help dealing with this.
WRITING.TEXT: Now before anyone says it, no, it isn't supposed to happen normally and yes, it's all because of script mods. And I need your help simmers of reddit. The set up: My founder's spouse died and was very sad. His wife came back as a ghost (not a playable ghost), and thanks to wicked whims they had some very nsfw time. But she was a ghost and elderly, so I thought nothing of it. A dew days pass, and my founder cracks on to his sons widow and they conceive a child. This child, Spinel, fills up the last of the 8 sim slots for a full house when he is born. Fast forward a few days and Spinel ages up in to a toddler. Another day passes and my founder gets a call from his late wife she just gave birth to their son. I was pretty shocked. Sure enough, my founder has an extra baby in his family tree. I saw no sign she had been pregnant the entire time. From what I understand, sims that get pregnant that shouldn't be cant give birth, and end up dropping cribs everywhere when they go in to labour. None of this happened. She apparently got pregnant, had a very extended pregnancy and popped out a kid. Now, the point of this story isnt me to tell you this happened, the point is to get help with what to do about it. I now have a baby somehow tied to my legacy lot (her urn is on the lot) that I cannot see. I checked all the other households but he isn't there, and I know this kid will not be looked after. So a social worker will be called eventually right? 1) I did have the brains to upload my legacy family to the exchange while Spinel was a baby, so I can redownload them to another lot/save and keep playing and nuke the glitchly legacy family. But I will loose all my portraits and urns in the process right, and I kind of want to keep them. 2) I some how add the phantom baby to the family through a cheat and move it in with another family for them to raise. Any idea how to do this one? It seems like the cleanest solution. I really hope someone can help me with this mess. I'd like to add my game really started to chugg and lag within the last few play sessions and im thinking its due to this ghostly pregnancy. I wonder if she was dropping cribs for days but I just couldn't see them?
Yes I have mccc. Mccc and WW are the two script mods I have.
I have MCCC, I had no idea it could do any of that. Thank-you!! I'm going to try this after work tonight.

Thank-you Thank-you Thank-you for letting me know mccc could do this. I made the ghosts household visible, merged the baby in with the Strouds and set the ghost household back to invisible. Life-saver!!
Would be great if sitting on it increased the chance of alien abduction.
My sims always turn invisible after a rocket trip, not sure what is up with that. I make them have a shower to become corporeal again.
I could only get through one episode. My stomach is *weak* She is great though lol.
Vlad turned up to my founders door. My founder was awake so I had them become best friends. He never tried to drink his blood, but always sent texts asking to hang. /shrug.
And here I am frustrated my 4th gen heir is already a teen and no abductions in my legacy yet. Im hoping if I have him join the scientist career he will get abducted eventually.

My friends and I have been using an interview spread from the site: #160;https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.autostraddle.com/fools-journey-get-to-know-your-new-tarot-deck-with-the-interview-spread-346310/amp/ Here is what I pulled: - What is your most important characteristic? Three of wands - What are your strengths as a deck? Judgment - What are your limits as a deck? Ace of Wands - What are you here to teach me? Seven of Swords - How can I best learn and collaborate with you? The Tower - What is the potential outcome of our working relationship? The Devil It is the Rider-Waite-Smith deck, and I was planning to use it to learn, and switch to the Marigold Tarot when it arrives. The Devil card really thew me, it seems really bad? I don't seem to be able to read this deck as easy as my other Prisma Visions one. Any help is appreciated :)

OP, we in the same predicament. Since the latest update my lap top I got off of ebay for 250 dollarydoos is just: "Oh the Sims 4? Yeah nah." I don't have to get one for school myself, but unless you are doing intensive 3D modeling or something any PC/Laptop you get with specs that can run the latest TS4 update should also work for school. I was looking at what is on offer at JB-HI FI, just to get an idea of what I can get for my budget. I'm looking at a particular laptop as baseline specs I want and its about $1,400 atm. I'm hoping for some good end of financial year sales after tax time though, to score something cheaper and maybe something with better specs if I am lucky. Of course if I put together a desk top I would get more power for less, but I wanna play in sims rugged up in bed lol.

WRITING.TITLE: Fire deck recommendation
WRITING.TEXT: Hi, I'm hoping you knowledgeable bunch can help me. I am looking for a fire elemental deck, or a deck that just screams 'fire'. For an air deck I have the Shadowscapes Tarot, I will pull the trigger on the 2019 Mermaids for water next pay packet and for earth I have the Animals Devine (although I'd prefer an animal tarot based on Australian animals as that is what I connect with - I do not have three hundy dollarydoos for a deck unfortunately). Sometime earlier during the year I made a post on another forum looking for a "sunburst" deck, but I was kind of vague in what I was looking for and ultimately didn't find the essence I was after. I had originally been thinking about the Lili White, but I could never bring myself to pull the trigger as from what I could tell it had copyright info on the cards and I cannot get passed it. I could also potentially get an erotic deck to work, but they all the ones I've seen seem problematic in some way. So, I hope you can help me with some recommendations :)
Honestly Tarot del Fuego would be perfect If I wasn't so damned picky over art style. Thank-you for the recommendation though :)

I like the fire tarot but yeah seems hard to come by. :( Serpentfire tarot is bright enough for sure, but the imagry is not for me. Thank-you for the recommendation though, even if im not partial i like to think maybe a lurker is and your recommendation helped them :)

Dragons! Why did I not think about dragons?! Of course my favourite of the ones I looked up seems to be out of print, Dragons Tarot. Seems to always be the way for me hahaha Thank-you for pointing me in this direction. Dragons will make a good holding deck until I stumble on..the one.
How do the backs look?
Haha oh it's funny cuz it's true.
10/10 best companion choices
...same.
The Theological Society have a VERY large selection of Tarot to browse.

DA:O Vaughn, Howe, Isolde, Eamon. Alistair gets an honorable for being so god forsaken annoying, and the fact he is a fandom favourite makes me dislike him more. DA2 Anders, Talis. DA:I Blackwall makes me roll my eyes but BIANCA IS THE WORST Varric was one of my favorite characters of all time and then I see him in a situation where he is allowing himself to be strung along by this wretched woman...Cut her off! Do whats best for you Varric! She doesn't care for you! GAH!

I have finished Origins 3 times, although I have finished every starting origin story once each. I have finished Awakening twice. I have finished DA2 3 times. I have finished DA: I 7 times, currently close to finish my 8th. I don't have a bunch of unfinished play throughs, I just play one off and on until it is complete. Still planning another run starting with Origins and ending with Inquisition. Maybe it will be done in time for DA4 :p
I'm so pleased to see Loghain as high as he is, Ill overlook you gave Blackwall S status. I too place DA:I Varric lower than DA2 Varric! Nice list, good to see opinions that are different than most.
YTA

I can't see this as bad, as just...really sexy/kinky. Especially with a tower as phallic as that one. Also rushing in to jumping the bones of someone you wouldn't normally pick for yourself mebe, with the reversed knight of swords. What deck is this btw?
How did that jar of red pills taste? YTA.
You're NTA in this case, but...you can also easily lose a relationship with your daughter over this. Pretty sucky to be you right now OP.

YTA. Move out and learn to fly on your own if you hate the arrangement. You have a full time job, it is more than a lot of people have when they suddenly find themselves without a roof over their head.
He said no kids /now/

I feel like this is a shit post. Because Karens do not use reddit right? Karen, if this is not a shit post you are rascist piece of shit. You probably didn't realize it until now, it took an entire thread of people saying YTA.

NAH Its ok to feel hurt you arn't getting your way after all this time, but all you are is a guest, and are not entitled to anything but being in more photos than some others. Planning a wedding is a major stressful event, and people inserting themselves "trying to help" or "wanting to feel a part of your special day" does a lot more harm than good to some couples than you may be aware of. Also if this bride is anything like me she was cringing inwardly the second you tried to insert yourself in to the plans. She is just clearly less blunt and less comfortable telling family members to back off than I was over mine.
NTA if you really had permission to look at the convo. If you didn't really have permission you all suck though. Your friend and bf are immature regardless.

ESH But he should have waited until it was safe to do so before overtaking. He didn't so you are not to blame for the accident. Depending on your country's road rules though you could have been pulled over for unsafe driving if going more than 10ks under.
NTA. But you will be treated like you are if you do say as much to her. I also fear becoming my mother :(
Yeah, i scrolled for this question. The first name traditional as dhe would like it so why be upset? Completely confusing scenario to me lol
NTA Nice Spine! If I ever gave birth id want no visitors for a week because I couldnt handle shit like this. Just me, OH and baby. Everyone else can wait.
YTA Dude. Basically told your pregnant wife you will leave her to knock up someone else, intend or not, its what you said. Also told your pregnant wife to go through invasive surgery. /golfclap

YTA Not only for what you did to your brother, your sister in law, but also your fiance. All that intense pressure to say yes. What if she had said no? Not only would that leave you upset but that would have really busted your brother's wedding.

NTA I would have not eaten your puddings to be honest because I wouldn't have trusted you cooked them non-vegan either (nothing to do with them being in the same oven - I also do not get this complaint personally, but I was not your guest, she is just more extreme compared to me I guess). But if she started complaining because /she/ refused to eat the puddings she is rude and it is on her. My sister always under provides for me and she has known my dietries for over five years. I still do not complain to her, she cooked and I didn't. Seems like a pretty massive and obvious etiquette faux paus to complain, at the dinner table, in front of other guests, about the spread. Did you offer to her something else? You are under no obligation to, but if you had something quick or easy on hand to make like a sandwich she may have appreciated it. She wouldn't have bitched you out then and you would have looked great. Or she still would have but you would know she is the asshole then and you wouldn't have to feel the need to post here.
Yeah, I agree. Not everyone with dietries are bonkers. But those are never the ones everyone hears about :/
NAH Wear what you like but expect a date to be uncomfortable when you give the "ring finger salute" to society norms.

INFO Did you research what the inverted cross actually means before you got it? I'm confused why a strongly anti-organised religion person (I am one too) would get a very catholic tattoo. EDIT: NVM i see everyone and their dog pointed this out to you. You are not an asshole for getting a tattoo on your ass btw. It is your ass not his.
I wasn't coming intentionally from anywhere negative. Did I stike a nerve?

ESH She sucks in general, for all reasons many people have covered. You suck, because you are still with her, acting righteous while getting pats on the back while you should have already left her for someone you actually respect.
NTA and these wedding posts always give me second hand anxiety as I remember the stress of trying to plan my first one (which fell apart and we broke up eventually).
NTA Also my respect for sticking to your guns. I'm forever trying to not go to my own birthday, im 33. Should have just done it this way from the start.
They /did/ say OP was a better person than they. No need to get self righteous.
NTA
I'm really enjoying all the people getting Rod's name wrong.
NTA.

NAH I would have laughed too dude. What can you do about? Not much. She has to save up for lazer or a coverup. Hopefully she learns from her mistake and researches good artists for that coverup. You could help her with this, might make her feel better?
How tall is his wife?

WRITING.TITLE: Looking for a tarot deck
WRITING.TEXT: A year ago I stumbled on a deck in progress I loved, but failed to bookmark it because im silly. It was hand drawn/painted with themes of nightmares and at least one card had an alien abduction theme. If i remember correctly the artist was possibly from the Scandanavia region - is this ringing any bells?
Thank-you no, it is not on there. It was a deck in progress and unreleased, but I have already checked anyway.
You are NTA, cook and bake w/e but you don't have to lie to get your point across. You just have to google once and you will be falling over oil based recipes that do work.

INFO: would she be happy if he played Fortnite with your supervision? When he's old enough he will just buy and play whatever and this way he is learning to play the older games in a safe and controlled environment. Don't go behind your wifes back, and you need to step up and "absolve the mum gets a final word environment."

Do you have this deck? Is there copyright info on the front of every card (like there is on new rws?) Every time I see this deck I want it but for the price the copyright info on every card would annoy me to death.
I sent him a question through his store. I really want it, really dig what I see but I know ill have to pass it on if it has copyright info on every card. Hope he responds lol.

If I don't get the bitcoins, I will definately send your video to all of your contacts, don't reply to this email it's hacked. #160;gLtctX ______ I havent used that password for years, it was received to an email that has been pwned multiple times, I haven't watched porn for months (took them long enough), but when I did I rubbed one out to Pegging. WRITING.TITLE: CMA - I always leave something behind for someone else.
WRITING.TEXT: Whenever we run out of a particular snack (chips/chocolate/whatever) my mother will always say: "Who ate all the X!" And tell off who owns up for not sharing. I started eating it all but leaving one piece so I never have to own up to it. Edit: Just amending this to say you are judging the alignment of 8-14 year old me, not 34 year old me that does not live at home and does not do this anymore. I wrote the original post in the structure I did because because I didn't think it would affect judgments at all if people knew. But if it is, now you know.
I did stop. You are judging me at about 8 -13 years old. Which...is still longer than most people but it is what is.

1) I was leaving something for them, never saw the need too. If they wanted some they either got in before me, or they took what I left. 2) I was stuffing myself with what I came across, either my sisters or mother had gotten in there first and had some or they hadn't. It sometimes was a fair proportion but very usually wasn't.
You're right, I never really got in trouble. Although I'm sure it annoyed my sisters to some degree on occasion. My mother found it exasperating and funny at the same time.
I honestly didn't think it would make a difference if people knew or not, should they not judge the same? But it is updated.

WRITING.TITLE: [Bedrock] How do I remove spawn eggs and end portals from the crafting table?
WRITING.TEXT: Windows 10. So I downloaded a copy of my realm (survival), mucked around with cheats on I guess and must have accidentally uploaded the cheat copy back to my realm instead? Then a windows update tanked my pc, and I had to wipe everything. A week later I have my pc working again and after a few hours of playing I notice spawn eggs are craftable in the crafting table... I could try downloading an old backup if that would even work but I don't want to undo my friends progress in the realm. Is there a way I can just fix the crafting in bedrock so noone can get too cheaty? Thank-you for reading :/
Only 1 player sleep from FoxyNoTail....
!Solved According to his twitter it is his mods, although he doesn't know why. Thank-you for pointing me in the right direction.

There's still a great chance Microsoft will realease them on ps anyway (even if further on down the line). Ignoring the chance to make money doesn't seem like Microsoft's style. But yeah, as a pc gamer who will buy the ps5, I'd still rather most Bethesda games on pc.
I don't have a guardian farm yet (is next on my list) but I love my blaze farm to bits.

I have a villager trading hall in the nether. They have beds which they use, they all seem to work fine besides the cartographer who sells glitched out maps. That might be a bedrock specific error though. Just don't accidentally sleep in their beds.
This. His iron farms are the only ones i can get to work.

Eh. I really wanted the moobloom, and the glowsquid was my second choice. The iceologer wasn't my third because it was hostile, it was third because wandering raiding parties spawn way too often on bedrock to the point of being annoying as hell and I had residual hatred. (Yes I know iceologers and the spawned raiding parties or not the same.)
Your argument does have merrit though. I think there are a lot more creative players than other mode players, which means the non-passive mob did have it stacked against them from the start.
The end is so dull as it is right now. It deserves biomes. I read somewhere that only a small percentage of players ever make it to end or something and that's why they are dragging their feet on it.
Oh man, I wana do something like this but build DS9 around the end dragon area. I'll get to it. One day. Edit: forgot praise. This is really cool I want to see the inside :)
I just copied Wattles storage system, and have Silent's item sorter on top. Edit: You said bedrock so I removed the java item sorter.

WRITING.TITLE: NSFWish - Topless (but nothing visible) - Painting my grandparents had.
WRITING.TEXT: Please help me find the artist of this painting. This (and another of the same woman) hung up at my Grandparent's place when I was a young girl. When they died it went missing. It would mean the world to me if I could get another copy of it. The picture I have I took at The Butterfly Club in Melbourne, Australia. I asked the staff there if they new anything about it but they didn't know. Please help me Reddit? #8203; [https://tagidoll.files.wordpress.com/2020/10/sadie.jpg](https://tagidoll.files.wordpress.com/2020/10/sadie.jpg)
